info.name: Elements Supply API Collection
info.description: Canonical contract for the Elements Supply public API.

request.description: Returns the compiled OpenAPI JSON artifact produced by the `api:spec:build` command.
Returns the Postman collection generated from the compiled OpenAPI document.
Lightweight readiness probe used by load balancers and the admin console.

item.name: Convert quantity using part base unit
List change orders for purchase order
List goods receipt notes for purchase order
List invoices for a purchase order

query.description: FULLTEXT search against RFQ title and item descriptions.

request.description: Returns RFQs scoped to the authenticated company with pagination, filtering, and tenant-safe envelopes.
Creates a draft RFQ. Attachments must adhere to RFQ document rules in `/deep-specs/documents.md`.
Cancels the RFQ and performs a soft delete per tenant policy.
Updates a draft or opens a new version according to RFQ versioning rules.
Awards an RFQ to a supplier, locking further edits.
Creates or updates RFQ line awards when partial awards are enabled.

item.name: Perform global search across tenant resources
